name: Dino Clicker
description:
Dino Clicker lets you collect, level up, evolve and interact with your virtual dinos.

When the first dino is bought it gives coins continuously. You can level up the dino further to get more coins per second. The dino also evolves from baby to adult to legendary forms once a particular level is reached. Once you have enough coins, you can buy the second dino which has higher starting earning rates. You can level this up too to increase the rate of earning. In this way, you keep on progressing and collect different dinos on the way.

Unlock and collect 'em all!
